tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ComplianceMonitoring (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  regulatory_requirements TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRequirements (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  due_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  record_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES ComplianceRequirements(id)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceViolations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES ComplianceRecords(id)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_name VARCHAR(255),
    check_description TEXT,
    regulation_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_id INT,
    entity_id INT,
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_notes TEXT
);
